data

Class OrderMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.OrderMapper

  • public class OrderMapper
extends Object
    This is one of our mapper classes. We execute SQL queries and bassed on that we either get the data or we input the data into the database Order Facade creates objects out of this class

    • Method Detail

      • createOrder

        public void createOrder(int customerId,
                        int salesRepId,
                        Timestamp date,
                        String carportType,
                        String roofType,
                        int carportWidth,
                        int carportLength,
                        int shedWidth,
                        int shedLength,
                        Double angle,
                        boolean status,
                        double price)
                 throws StorageLayerException
        this mapper method creates order with specified attributes which are given out by the user input
        Parameters:
        customerId - id of the customer
        salesRepId - id of the employee
        date - date of the order creation
        carportType - type of the carport(pointy or flat)
        roofType - type of the roof
        carportWidth - width of the carport
        carportLength - length of the carport
        shedWidth - width of the shed
        shedLength - length of the shed
        angle - angle of the roof
        status - is the order paid or not
        price - the ammount that is needed to pay
        Throws:
        StorageLayerException

      • retrieveCarport

        public Carport retrieveCarport(int idOrder)
                        throws StorageLayerException
        This method selects all the necessary attributes about the carport from the database and returns it. It returns the specific carport based on order ID.
        Parameters:
        idOrder - Order ID
        Returns:
        carport
        Throws:
        StorageLayerException
